page.title: 04Where people worked.
page.content: We asked the residents of our block where they worked.Quite a lot of them worked outside the county(Northants). There were four main groups: THOSE WORKING IN HELLIDON ITSELF:8(4 farmed,2 ran a riding school for dis- abled). THOSE WORKING LOCALLY:13(Staverton 4, Daventry 9). THOSE WORKING ELSEWHERE IN NORTHANTS: 5(Northampton 3,Wellingborough 1,and Corby 1). THOSE WORKING OUT OF COUNTY:25.(Rugby 3.Milton Keynes 1.Leamington 2.Warwick 1.Stratford 1.Coventry 4.Kenilworth1.Loughborough 1.Banbury 2. Dunstable 1.Berkhamstead 1.Manchester 2.London 2.Chichester 1.Stratford:1. Kuwait 1.Mexico:1. 5 of these people travelled abroad in pursuit of their work.
